History of the City Government
==============================

Overview
--------

The petition for incorporation was filed, approved and ordered on September 24, 1958.  The City of Watauga was incorporated on October 11, 1958 after an election.  The first Home Rule Charter was adopted by citizens after an election on January 19, 1980.
